sense.name: briefly immerse in a liquid
sense.examples: They take the Oreo and dunk it in milk. We want to take his head and dunk it in water. Dunk a towel in water mixed with 1/4 cup of baking soda. Why dip when you can dunk? She'll dunk the crust in. You take the test strip and you dunk it in the coffee.

sense.name: make a dunk shot in basketball
sense.examples: One time, I went up to dunk and pulled a stomach muscle. Kobe Bryant caught it and dunked. You're 13, you're 6-9, and you can't dunk. Russell dunked and the backboard shattered. Obama remains something short of the total hoops package; he can't dunk.
